section.name: Work to do for the current release
section.p: This file is intended to collect ideas, problems and work to do with the current Turbine code.

subsection.name: Work to do for the current release

ul.li: Bring all the jars up to date, get all needed jars on ibiblio

subsection.name: Stuff that needs to be looked into (current release or next release)

ul.li: Make sure that pull tools get refreshed correctly under all circumstances
Check lifetimes of authorized and session tools if the application is not the standard login-logout application
Move AvalonComponentService to the Fortress container (suggested by the avalon-dev list)

subsection.name: Blue Skying for future Turbine releases

ul.li: Move forward to a component based architecture (avalonization)
"Steal" the pipeline from the Turbine 3 code base
Decouple the code base into core, components and toolbox
